value.name: Tulare Police detectives search for deadly shooting suspects, including convicted murderer
value.description: TULARE, Calif. (KFSN) -- Tulare Police say 23-year-old Jonathan Ramirez was shot as he sat in a car on F Street on Friday night. The victim was rushed to the hospital and placed on life support ...

value.name: Tulare men gunned down, police search for suspected killers
value.description: Tulare detectives are investigating back-to-back shootings that claimed the lives of two men. The shooters in both cases are still on the loose and police are asking for help from the public to bring the killers to justice.
